activities: Processing of employee and non-employee personal information (i.e., human resources data related to full-time employees, as well as seasonal or temporary staff) on Celanese systems housed in Celanese data centers and approved (meeting adequecy requirements) third party systems.

recoursemech: Cooperation with the EU Data Protection Authorities
